short_description: oswal colour chem is a chemicals company based in kolkata, india.
long_description: established in the year 2004, we, oswal group of companies, are a renowned manufacturer and exporter of pigments. our products are used in paints, printing inks, plastic, rubber, textile, soap & detergents, paper, plastic color compounds, pvc leather, lime colors, construction, dry colors, cosmetics, leather, food, carbon paper, personal care etc. we have organized sales network across india having established branches at ahmedabad, delhi, kolkata, hyderabad, jallandhar and distributers and representatives all over india and abroad. our organization has set up plants for manufacturing of organic & inorganic pigments powders as per international standards.

long_description: established in the year 1990, we, oswal group of companies, are a renowned manufacturer and exporter of pigments. our products are used in paints, printing inks, plastic, rubber, textile, soap & detergents, paper, plastic color compounds, pvc leather, lime colors, construction, dry colors, cosmetics, leather, food, carbon paper, personal care etc. we have organized sales network across india having established branches at ahmedabad, delhi, kolkata, hyderabad, jallandhar and distributers and representatives all over india and abroad. our organization has set up plants for manufacturing of organic & inorganic pigments powders as per international standards. since last two decades, our organization has been able to offer consistent quality and services and establish renowned name in market. sanjeev dugar, c.a., c.s., icwa, llb we have emerged as a distinguished name admist our clients. we have satisfied clients in the field of paints, printing inks, rubbers, textile, plastic & master batch industries.
generated_description: oswalcolourchem, established in 1990 and based in kolkata, west bengal, is a renowned manufacturer and exporter of pigments. the company's products are utilized in various industries, including paints, printing inks, plastics, rubber, textiles, soap and detergents, paper, plastic color compounds, pvc leather, lime colors, construction, dry colors, cosmetics, leather, food, carbon paper, and personal care. oswalcolourchem operates a sales network across india, with branches in ahmedabad, delhi, kolkata, hyderabad, and jallandhar, and distributes its products globally. the company is committed to quality and timely delivery, supported by a dedicated team and state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities.
